channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 01-Sep-16
item.description:
"He says gods like to see an atheist around. Gives them something to aim at."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods

item.title: 31-Aug-16
item.description:
""Slave is an Ephebian word. In Om we have no word for slave," said Vorbis. "So I understand," said the Tyrant. "I imagine that fish have no word for water.""

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods

item.title: 30-Aug-16
item.description:
"Pour encourjay lays ortras."

- Terry Pratchett, Guards! Guards!

item.title: 29-Aug-16
item.description:
"There were no flies on C.M.O.T Dibbler. He would have charged them rent."

- Terry Pratchett, The Truth

item.title: 28-Aug-16
item.description:
"Most gods find it hard to walk and think at the same time."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods
